org.opends.quicksetup

Enum SecurityOptions.CertificateType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SecurityOptions.CertificateType>
      • org.opends.quicksetup.SecurityOptions.CertificateType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<SecurityOptions.CertificateType>
    Enclosing class:
    SecurityOptions

    public static enum SecurityOptions.CertificateType
extends Enum<SecurityOptions.CertificateType>
    The different type of security options that we can have.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BCFKS
      Use an existing BCFKS key store.
      JCEKS
      Use an existing JCEKS key store.
      JKS
      Use an existing JKS key store.
      NO_CERTIFICATE
      No certificate to be used (and so no SSL and no Start TLS).
      PKCS11
      Use an existing PKCS#11 key store.
      PKCS12
      Use an existing PKCS#12 key store.
      SELF_SIGNED_CERTIFICATE
      Use a newly created Self Signed Certificate.
